00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_SLIDER_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_SLIDER_H_
00031 
00032 #include "mimas/mimas.h"
00033 
00034 #include "mimas/range_widget.h"
00035 
00036 #include <QtGui/QWidget>
00037 
00038 #include <iostream>
00039 
00040 using namespace lubyk;
00041 
00042 namespace mimas {
00043 
00049 class Slider : public QWidget, public ThreadedLuaObject {
00050   Q_OBJECT
00051   Q_PROPERTY(QString class READ cssClass)
00052   Q_PROPERTY(float hue READ hue WRITE setHue)
00053   Q_PROPERTY(int   border READ borderWidth WRITE setBorderWidth)
00054 public:
00055 
00056   enum Defaults {
00057     DefaultWidth  = 30,
00058     DefaultHeight = 150
00059   };
00060 
00061   enum SliderType {
00062     HorizontalSliderType = 1,
00063     VerticalSliderType = 2,
00064   };
00065 
00066   Slider(int type = (int)VerticalSliderType, QWidget *parent = 0)
00067       : QWidget(parent),
00068         slider_type_((SliderType)type),
00069         hue_(-1),
00070         border_width_(2) {
00071     QObject::connect(
00072       this,  SIGNAL(sliderChanged(double)),
00073       this,  SLOT(sliderChangedSlot(double)));
00074     MIMAS_DEBUG_CC
00075   }
00076 
00077   virtual ~Slider() {
00078     MIMAS_DEBUG_GC
00079   }
00080 
00081   // Destructor method called when the object goes out of Lua scope
00082   void luaDestroy() {
00083     luaCleanup();
00084     if (parent()) {
00085       // the callback function is now dead, make sure it is never called
00086       QObject::disconnect(this, 0, this, 0);
00087     }
00088     delete this;
00089   }
00090 
00091   // ============================ common code to all mimas Widgets
00092 
00093   QString cssClass() const {
00094     return QString("slider");
00095   }
00096 
00097   QWidget *widget() {
00098     return this;
00099   }
00100 
00101   QObject *object() {
00102     return this;
00103   }
00104 
00107   LuaStackSize name(lua_State *L) {
00108     lua_pushstring(L, QObject::objectName().toUtf8().data());
00109     return 1;
00110   }
00111 
00114   void setName(const char *name) {
00115     QObject::setObjectName(QString(name));
00116   }
00117 
00118   void move(int x, int y) {
00119     QWidget::move(x, y);
00120   }
00121 
00122   void resize(int w, int h) {
00123     QWidget::resize(w, h);
00124   }
00125 
00126   int x() {
00127     return QWidget::x();
00128   }
00129 
00130   int y() {
00131     return QWidget::y();
00132   }
00133 
00134   int width() {
00135     return QWidget::width();
00136   }
00137 
00138   int height() {
00139     return QWidget::height();
00140   }
00141 
00142   void setStyle(const char *text) {
00143     QWidget::setStyleSheet(QString(".%1 { %2 }").arg(cssClass()).arg(text));
00144   }
00145 
00146   void setStyleSheet(const char *text) {
00147     QWidget::setStyleSheet(text);
00148   }
00149 
00150   void setHue(float hue) {
00151     hue_ = hue;
00152     update();
00153   }
00154 
00155   float hue() {
00156     return hue_;
00157   }
00158   // =============================================================
00159 
00160   virtual QSize sizeHint() const {
00161     if (slider_type_ == VerticalSliderType) {
00162       return QSize(DefaultWidth, DefaultHeight);
00163     } else {
00164       return QSize(DefaultHeight, DefaultWidth);
00165     }
00166   }
00167 
00168   void setBorderWidth(int width) {
00169     border_width_ = width;
00170   }
00171 
00172   int borderWidth() const {
00173     return border_width_;
00174   }
00175 
00176 public slots:
00180   void setValue(double remote_value) {
00181     if (range_.setValue(remote_value)) {
00182       update();
00183     }
00184   }
00185 
00189   void sliderChangedSlot(double value) {
00190     lua_State *L = lua_;
00191 
00192     if (!pushLuaCallback("sliderChanged")) return;
00193     lua_pushnumber(lua_, value);
00194     // ... <sliderChanged> <self> <value>
00195     int status = lua_pcall(L, 2, 0, 0);
00196 
00197     if (status) {
00198       fprintf(stderr, "Error in 'sliderChanged' callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00199     }
00200   }
00201 
00202 signals:
00203 
00206   void sliderChanged(double);
00207 
00208 protected:
00209   virtual void mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event);
00210   virtual void mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event);
00211   virtual void mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent* event);
00212   virtual void paintEvent(QPaintEvent *event);
00213 
00214 private:
00215   SliderType slider_type_;
00216   float hue_;
00217   int   border_width_;
00218   RangeWidget range_;
00219 };
00220 
00221 } // mimas
